title: Payment System / App For Sale With Developer
text: Questions Business Summary TippingCircle is a mobile and web application that enables people around the world to exchange money and points with ''tips''. Create your social tipping circle by connecting with your social networks to easily exchange money with friends, set-up group payments, and crowd fund using tipping buckets. TippingCircle is a freemium model where users can have an account and use the system for free. While the app does generate revenue from transaction fees, it hasn't reached millions of users yet to generate substantial revenue from the transaction fees. The value of this business opportunity primarily lies in the custom built software that is scalable and solid as it's been used consistently over the past 2 years with user registrations and usage spreading through word of mouth. Our team can grow this business as is and flood the internet with it's catchy social buzz or implement this system into a current business network/infrastructure to increase the value of another business and potentially drive in more revenue by leveraging TippingCircle to help the business grow by engaging users. There is so much you can do with this system. For one, it has the ability to exchange money and points. A hot internet trend right now is to gammify your business to engage users/customers and keep them coming back. Giving users a way to earn points through different interactions with your business and make those points valuable so customers can get discounts or earn prizes will add value to any business. There are many other ideas I have noted down that will be shared with the new partners. Mobile App
